metadata.synopsis: One liner triggered when entering larder in Philgraves Mansion. The place is FULL of bodies, viscera and blood. It is the place where the dead are kept in storage to serve as nourrishment for the ghouls that serve Carrion. Players react to this sight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Teleport to CTY_Main_A -1395; 1; 81Pick up canopic jar

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That smell... These corpses aren't the freshest.
